m_szDocTitle: Nanotechnology Now - News Story: Altairnano to demo electric SUV
m_szDocSumamry: Nanotechnology Now Home > News > Altairnano to demo electric SUV September 22nd, 2006 Altairnano to demo electric SUV Abstract: Altair Nanotechnologies Inc. (NASDAQ: ALTI) with their electric vehicle partners, Boshart Engineering and Phoenix Motorcars, will road demonstrate a full size electric SUV at the California Air Resources Board Zero Emission Vehicle (ZEV) Technology Symposium, held next week, September 25-27, 2006 in Sacramento, California. Source:
